title: Fighting forest fires with power pumps
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Fire extinction - Equipment and supplies
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Fire fighters
Climate, Environment, Natural Resources & Disasters/Forest fires - Prevention and control
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fire fighters
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Fire extinction - Equipment and supplies
description: An instructional film on the use of power pumps in forest fire-fighting. Portable equipment, the operation of a gasoline pump, the efficient deployment of men, precautions in handling hose and equipment, and effective use of varying pressures and volumes of water are demonstrated.
